QuestData.Title: Donnelly Dunwald
QuestData.Description: So you be lookin' to find us, and I be lookin' to find me brothers. It sounds to me like we got some common ground in there abouts.$B$BDonnelly's our eldest, and while his size shows it, his wits might not. He's usually up in the northern ruins - in the hovel. Do ya think you might go lookin' for him for me? It'd be a right comfort if I knew he were safe.
QuestData.RewardText: Hi friend! I don't think I know you... I'm Donnelly Dunwald.$B$BWhat's your name? I don't think I know you... Do I know you?
